label: Banking and Financial Services
description: Financial products and services offered by banks and other financial institutions.

subcategories.label: Savings Accounts
subcategories.description: Accounts that allow customers to save money and earn interest.

subcategories.label: Current Accounts
subcategories.description: Accounts that allow customers to manage their day-to-day finances.

subcategories.label: Loans
subcategories.description: Borrowing money from a bank or other financial institution.

subcategories.label: ISAs
subcategories.description: Individual Savings Accounts that allow customers to save money tax-free.
